detail_desc: Short skirt in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Fully lined, non-wired bikini top with adjustable shoulder straps, removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, lacing at the front and a frill trim at the hem. No fasteners.

Wide waist belt in imitation leather with elastic and a metal buckle at the back. Two small bags at the front, connected with a metal chain. One bag has a flap and press-stud and the other is round with a zip. Width of belt 9 cm.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Short, draped skirt in a zebra-striped weave with a concealed zip in one side and an asymmetric hem. Voluminous and draped at one side. Lined.
Trenchcoat woven in a soft viscose blend with notch lapels and a loose yoke at the back. Detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and no buttons. Unlined.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with tie-top shoulder straps, decorative gathers at the front, a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Double layer at the top. Unlined.
Long-sleeved hooded jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a contrasting colour longer layer with slits at the hem.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with an elasticated, drawstring waist, discreet side pockets and elasticated hems.
Block-patterned scarf in a soft weave with fringes along the sides.
Hat knitted in a soft cotton blend with ears on the top and a ribbed hem.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in soft viscose jersey with long sleeves. Elastication around the top, cuffs and hem.

Dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a low stand-up collar, buttons down the front, some of which are concealed, a gathered yoke at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons down the front. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette. For the matching trousers, search on 0391750.
Sock-style court shoes in imitation leather with a jersey top section, pointed toes and covered heels. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 6 cm.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.

WILLIAM MORRIS & CO. x H&M. Shirt in an airy, patterned weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell and cotton blend with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neck. Slightly longer at the back.
Cardigan in a soft bouclé knit made from a wool blend with a hood and no buttons.
Two pairs of longjohns in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Shirt jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Unlined.
Short dress in woven fabric with a deep V-neck, wrapover front and a seam with ties at the waist. Short, raglan puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Jersey lining.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short, wide sleeves that finish at the elbows, and a smocked seam at the waist.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front, yoke at the back, chest pocket and rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Dressing gown in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, long sleeves, and tie belt at the waist. Narrow ribbing at the cuffs, hem and front edge. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a gentle V-neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front, ribbing around the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Jumper in fine-knit slub cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Slightly shorter jacket in a textured cotton bouclé weave with buttons down the front and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined in satin made from viscose and recycled polyester.

Ankle-length sports joggers in jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket, all with a concealed zip. Ventilating mesh section at the crotch. The polyester content of the joggers is recycled.
Short, wide, short-sleeved sports top in printed, fast-drying mesh layered over a vest top with a racer back.
Wide top in soft viscose jersey with short dolman sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Hairband with leaf and flower appliqués.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.

Jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke front and back. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Padded, oversized jacket in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Lined hood with an elasticated drawstring, a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, concealed side pockets with a zip and long sleeves with narrow ribbed elastication at the cuffs. Lined. The filling is made from recycled polyester.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and two elastic straps at each side.
Sleeveless top in jersey with a lace-covered V-neck front and back.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high paper bag waist, side pockets, detachable tie belt and tapered legs.
Cropped top in a crinkled viscose weave with a deep V-neck, decorative buttons at the front and short puff sleeves.Wide smocking around the sleeves and hem.
T-shirt in soft jersey with an interactive motif on the front.

Set with two T-shirts and two pairs of shorts in soft, printed, organic cotton jersey. T-shirts with narrow trims around the neckline and a press-stud on each shoulder. Shorts with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Transparent rain jacket designed to fit a small dog with a hood and a hole for a lead at the back of the neck. Hook and loop tab at the neck and a belt with a hook and loop fastener at the waist.
Boxy jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a lace panel down the sides and ties at the cuffs. Ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Jumper in a soft cable knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in printed, slub-textured sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with embroidery and terry appliqués at the front. Brushed inside.
Boxy jumper in a soft fine knit made partly from recycled polyester. Ribbed turtle neck, long dolman sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cap in cotton twill with an inner sweatband and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Set with a vest top and briefs in soft cotton jersey with picot trims. Vest top with a decorative bow at the neckline. Briefs with a bow at the front.
Handmade fabric bracelets, one decorated with wooden beads and one with plastic shells.
Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide ribbed waistband containing a concealed key pocket, and legs with ventilating mesh sections.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, zip at the top and slits in the sides.
Fully lined swimsuit in fast-drying functional fabric. Narrow cut at the top with a zip at the front and mesh details at the sides.

Stylish, slightly longer, tailored jacket in a wool weave that fastens with a detachable tab and button. Narrow notch lapels, extra-long sleeves with a high slit at the cuffs and jetted front pockets with a flap. Lined.
T-shirt in lightweight jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Straight-cut shirt in a viscose weave with a gently tapered waist, narrow turn-down collar and classic front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Dress in an airy, patterned weave with decorative gathers at the front of the neck and a small opening and button at the back of the neck. Double-layered butterfly sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Jersey lining.
Scarf in a soft jacquard weave with fringes on the short sides.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a contrasting colour press-stud placket and ribbing.
Scarf in a soft jacquard weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 80x170 cm.
Socks in a soft, fine knit with elasticated ribbing at the top.

Shirt in cotton twill with a concealed button-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey, one with a print motif.
Sandals in a cotton weave with a braided jute trim around the soles and a hook and loop tab around the ankles. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Chunky-knit jumper in a cotton blend containing glittery threads. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Satin top with embroidery at the top and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with a low, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.

Short, wide dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a gathered seam at the hips. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Cycling shorts in ribbed jersey. High waist with covered elastication.
Hooded top in printed sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, ribbed cuffs and a raw-edge hem.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, open back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups with roll edges at the hems.

Boxy-style top in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Ribbed trim with a contrasting colour stripe around the neckline, and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable mesh with an elasticated waist and side pockets. Unlined.
